item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Mischa van der Bent and I’m the author of this Blog. I made it to my experience while solving challenges. We all know how hard is to start something on the web, especially these days. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff, configure them and when that’s done — create the content. This theme is pretty basic and covers all of the essentials. All you have to do is start typing!
